output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: No visible CMF number, but this doesn't automatically disqualify it as propaganda.
2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions "Marcel Ciolacu" as a presidential candidate.
3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid Facebook/Instagram ad targeting the citizens of Bucovăț commune, with an estimated reach of 1,001-5,000 people.
4. Electoral objective: Yes, clearly presents electoral objectives: - Explicitly asks people to vote for Marcel Ciolacu as "viitorul Președinte al României" - Encourages voting for PSD Dolj's parliamentary list - Sets specific dates (November 24, December 1 and 8)
5. Journalism: No, this is clearly a political message from a PSD local counselor.
6. Personal opinion: While signed by a local counselor, this is an official party communication meant to influence votes.
This post constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Directly references a presidential candidate - Has clear electoral objectives - Is paid advertising reaching a wide audience - Explicitly calls for votes for specific candidates

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because it: - Explicitly promotes a presidential candidate (Marcel Ciolacu) - Calls for direct action (voting) - Is paid advertising reaching thousands - Combines presidential and parliamentary messaging - Uses official party channels (PSD Dolj)
conclusion.message-for-police: PSD Dolj, prin consilierul local Ionuț Mlagiu, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei pentru alegerile prezidențiale, folosind o postare sponsorizată pe Facebook (ID: 4246401465586841) după data de 23.11.2024, ora 18:00. Postarea îndeamnă în mod direct cetățenii să voteze candidatul PSD Marcel Ciolacu ca "viitorul Președinte al României", având un efect electoral direct și explicit prin folosirea unor îndemnuri clare la vot ("veniți la vot și alegeți candidatul PSD Marcel Ciolacu"). Postarea are caracter de propagandă electorală conform Art. 36(7), fiind folosită pentru promovarea unui candidat specific la președinție, adresându-se publicului larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe platformele de social media, depășind astfel limitele comunicării informative.
